help.instructions_1: You can use it to guess an unknown word (leave the top row empty) or test against a known word (put the word in the top row) - click the pen icon to edit.
help.instructions_2: You can choose Easy or Hard mode, using the wordle standard list of words or the full list.
help.instructions_3: If the word is not knows the top row will show hints extracted from the guesses.
help.instructions_4: You can click a suggested word (or a matching word) to auto fill the guess row - if the word to guess is known the the guess will be automatically checked and added as a guess.
help.instructions_5: In the guess row it tries to auto select the match colors. If you guess an unknown word click a letter to cycle the match color (Green - the letter is in the correct position, Yellow - the letter is in the wrong position). A red dot in the corner of a letter means there is a conflict with a previous guess.
help.title: Wordle puzzle solver

solver.btn_to_easy_full_mode_tooltip: Switch to full list easy mode

solver.btn_to_hard_full_mode_tooltip: Switch to full list hard mode
